full_description:
We are actively seeking and on-boarding new developers to our mobile development teams, working at one of our many Fortune500 client-projects across the United States. If you're passionate about iOS, Mobile Technology, and want to work with the most current technology Apple has to offer, send us your resume at resume@softwaremerchant.com, along with your work authorization, to be considered.
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Start Date: 12/01/2025
\n
End Date: 12/31/2025
\n
Location: Wayne, PA 19087
\n
IT Consulting company (Wayne, PA) seeks Business Systems Analyst to design, develop, and implement business application software by using Cobol, CICS, DB2, JCL, VSAM, Rexx, LISP, SAS, IBM DB2, MVS Z/OS, OS X, Microsoft Visio, Expeditor, Endevor, File Aid, QMF, Hadoop, MS Project, Visual Source Safe, AB Initio and Informatica. Handle release scope test planning & execution. Work with Product Owner for Backlog grooming, Defining Iteration content, & Story Elaboration. Work with developers for test data staging. Resolve open issues during various testing phases. Submit resume to Software Merchant, Inc., 487 Devon Park Dr., Ste. 215, Wayne, PA 19087
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n   Print Job\n
\n
\n
